author: djd
msg: DERBY-2242 (partial) Add more fixtures to DatabaseMetaDataTest that cover almost
all the methods that do not return a ResultSet. Add a utility method
to JDBC to allow simple checking of data types for a returned ResultSet.

author: vsiveton
msg: DOXIA-40: Request for a TOC-like feature
o added a new TOC macro to handle that (i.e. in an apt file %{toc|section=2|fromDepth=2|toDepth=2} )
o used some classes from doxia-book to do that
o updated doxia-book with new references from core
o modified the apt and xdoc parsers to add a second parsing way (maybe to be optimized)

msg: SOLR-108: Request::Standard cleanup (contributed by William Groppe), with slight addition to fix failing test because rows became zero instead of nil
